item.description:
37th Annual Hopkinton
Polyarts Festival

Saturday, September 17, 2011
Hopkinton Town Common
10:00 am – 4:00 pm

Come out for Polyarts for some family friendly fun!

Description: Polyarts began in 1974 as a demonstration of various arts and crafts to showcase the talents of the local community. Since then it has grown into a day long event with many professional craftspeople, performing artists and community groups participating throughout the day.

Polyarts is free to attend and is a family-friendly day with something for everyone, be it food, music, crafts or other entertainment.

email: hopintonpolyarts@yahoo.com
Website: http://www.hopkintonpolyarts.com

Vendor List
item.name: 37th Annual Hopkinton Polyarts Festival
